result.eng: Will you be in the bar tonight?
result.ga: An mbeidh tú sa bheár anocht
result.orig: An mbeidh tú sa bheár anocht
result.html: An mbeidh tú sa bheár anochtWill you be in the bar tonight?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ tú sa ḃeár anoċtWill you be in the bar tonight?

result.eng: I was in the bar with a few friends and it was great fun.
result.ga: Bhí mé sa bheár le cúpla cara agus bhí an chraic go hiontach
result.orig: Bhí mé sa bheár le cúpla cara agus bhí an chraic go hiontach
result.html: Bhí mé sa bheár le cúpla cara agus bhí an chraic go hiontachI was in the bar with a few friends and it was great fun.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé sa ḃeár le cúpla cara agus ḃí an ċraic go hiontaċI was in the bar with a few friends and it was great fun.

result.eng: He was standing at the bar.
result.ga: Bhí sé ina sheasamh ag an bheár
result.orig: Bhí sé ina sheasamh ag an bheár
result.html: Bhí sé ina sheasamh ag an bheárHe was standing at the bar.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ina ẛeasaṁ ag an ḃeárHe was standing at the bar.
